definition[0]: used to emphasize that someone or something does not have a particular quality or would not do something
example[0]: He’s no more fit to be a priest than I am!
definition[1]: used to say that something is not too much, but exactly right or suitable
example[1]: It’s no more than you deserve.
example[2]: Eline felt it was no more than her duty to look after her husband.
definition[2]: used to say that someone or something is not very great or important
example[3]: He’s no more than a glorified accountant.
example[4]: He left school with little more than a basic education.
